title: Anti-Crypto Senator Seeks Financial Aid, Faces Backlash from Coinbase CEO
description:
Rerunning U.S. Senator Jon Tester, co-sponsor of anti-crypto legislation, faces financial trouble. The senator faces backlash from the crypto community after seeking financial aid on social media. Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong questions Tester’s stance on crypto. U.S. Senator Jon Tester, known for his skepticism about cryptocurrencies and his co-sponsorship of anti-crypto legislation, has found himself […]

The post Anti-Crypto Senator Seeks Financial Aid, Faces Backlash from Coinbase CEO appeared first on Coin Edition.
